message: Can you guys recommend anyone to chop up a PSD and make it a Tumblr theme?
I'm not sure that's such a good thing to be looking for.
Tumblr downtime is terrible, you probably don't want to be building a business on top of it
you can just write html/css as normal and then drop in tumblr's template tags and you're good to go
tumblr theming is pretty straightforward -- it's a single template
I'm a dab hand at htmlifying PSDs but I've never made a Tumblr theme
Is there anything specific involved in Tumblr theming?
@travhimself, OP prolly wants PSD -> tumblr because (s)he don't know html/css?
Cool. Thanks for the feedback... Not building a business on top of tumblr... just the company blog.

And I didn't want to spend developer time learning the intricacies of tumblr themes, so we're outsourcing it to someone who knows it well. After doing research, we ended up filling out an order with http://htmlrockstars.com/get-started/ $309
